faqs.q: Do we have to book in to the puppy socialisation classes, or can we just turn up?
faqs.a: Due to Covid-19 restrictions you will need to book an apointment, before attending..

faqs.q: Can I bring my children to the puppy socialisation classes?
faqs.a: Children are encouraged to come and take part in the puppy socialisation classes.

faqs.q: What happens, if my dog is over 5 months, and I have not attended 6 classes?
faqs.a: You will be credited the money for the classes you have not used in the Bronze course
